title: 动作感知错误码
summary: Multimodal Awareness Kit MultimodalAwareness 模块的 动作感知错误码，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: 31500001 服务异常
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Service exception. Possible causes: 1. A system error, such as null pointer, container-re

sections.title: 31500002 订阅失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Subscription failed. Possible causes: 1. Callback registration failure; 2. Failed to bind

sections.title: 31500003 取消订阅失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Unsubscription failed. Possible causes: 1. Callback failure; 2. N-API invocation exceptio
